feed.title: Red Earth Creek - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:10 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Earth 04:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -25.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
